article_title: Goldsboro man charged with kidnapping, soliciting minor for prostitution
article_text:
GOLDSBORO, Wayne County -

A 34-year-old Wayne County man has been charged with kidnapping and soliciting a minor for prostitution.

Aureo Lopez was arrested Thursday in Wayne County. Investigators said Lopez sexually assaulted a female juvenile then took her to an unknown location and solicited the victim for favors. The girl was able to escape and alert investigators.

Lopez is being held on $300,000 bond.
